short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for automatic logging into STU AIS system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: STU (Slovak University of Technology) uses AIS system for communication between students, teachers and other employees. To sign in user must enter a username and a password, but chrome doesn't automatically enter your password when username is chosen. AIS Logger solves this problem by saving your credentials on your system and when you enter login screen of AIS, automatically enters your credentials and signs you in.
